caption.center: JAMES HOVEY, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from the Circuit Court for Wakulla County, N. Sanders Sauls, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
James Hovey, pro se, Appellant.
Charlie Crist, Attorney General, and Terry P. Roberts, Assistant Attorney General, Tallahassee, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
DAVIS, BROWNING, and LEWIS, JJ., CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF IF FILED.
